Read about the uncertainty property of the Fourier transform and write no more than three sentences to explain what it is.
Analytically compute the Fourier transform of exp(bt)u(-t), where b is positive, u(t) is the step function (u(t)=1 for positive t and 0 otherwise).
u(t) is the step function (u(t)=1 for positive t and 0 otherwise).
